title: Jamaican seafood curry
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons of olive oil', '6 spring onions, finely chopped', '1 yellow pepper, sliced', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '1 1/2 teaspoons curry powder', '1/2 teaspoons of chilli powder or dried chilli pepper flakes', '1/2 teaspoon allspice powder', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons brown sugar', 'Pinch of salt', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '3 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '300g swordfish or cod fillets, sliced into chunks', '250g peeled prawns', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped coriander', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice']
